Headline: #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express Temporary Reroute at Lower Wacker/Orleans
ShortDescription: 120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lower Wacker, Columbus, and Illinois due to street blockage near Lower Wacker/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lower Wacker, Columbus, and Illinois due to street blockage near Lower Wacker/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.
